author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Six! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

In the great tradition of Roadside Picnic, Metro 2033, The Southern Reach (Annihilation) and STALKER we've got AFTERMATH! A massive disaster leads to an exclusion zone in Spectre Miniatures newest operation to check out. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook and starter set in digital  HERE: https://spectreminiatures.com/collections/aftermath
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 046 - AFTERMATH  by Spectre Miniatures
